text: Sano awala watwapele chitabu (mpela Abdullah bin Salam ni Ayuda wane waasingwiche) akuisengwela ayila yaitulusyidwe kukwenu (jajili Qur’an), nambo m’mikutula jine (jamakafili) mwana waakuikana ine mwa yalakweyo. Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Chisimu une namulidwe kuti nan’galagatileje Allah ni ngawwanganyaga Jwalakwe (ni chilichose). Kukwakwe nguwilanjila, soni Kukwakwe nikwakuujila kwangu.”
